00030 void UIBrowseVersesWidget::display_verse_text(const QModelIndex& index)
00031 {
00032     boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay> verse_to_display = m_browse_model->get_verse_display(index);
00033     if (verse_to_display->get_verse_id() != -1)
00034         emit verse_display_changed(verse_to_display);
00035 }
